title: why my v-model can't binding ? (laravel,vue)
body:
I have a form to fill in the information, I would like to use vue to fill in the field of foolproof detection

this is my html code

        {{ Form::open(array('id'=>"lessor_new_crte",'method' => 'POST','url'=>route('drillmaster.lessorupdate'))) }}
        <tr>
            <th class="required">姓名</th>
            <td>
                {{ Form::text("name", '',array('class' => 'form-control input-sm','v-model' => 'name')) }}
            </td>
            <th class="required">電話</th>
            <td>
                <div class="input-group">
                    <span class="input-group-addon">區碼(</span>
                    {{ Form::text("areacode", '',array('class' => 'form-control input-sm','v-model' => 'areacode','placeholder' => '02','size' =>'04')) }}
                    <span class="input-group-addon">)</span>
                    {{ Form::text("phone", '',array('class' => 'form-control input-sm','v-model' => 'phone','placeholder' => '02')) }}
                </div>
            </td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
            <th class="required">稱呼</th>
            <td>
                <div class="radio rh-inline">
                    <label>{{Form::radio('title','先生')}}先生</label>
                    <label>{{Form::radio('title','小姐')}}小姐</label>
                </div>
            </td>

            <th class="required">手機</th>
            <td>
                {{ Form::text("mobile", '',array('class' => 'form-control input-sm','v-model' => 'mobile')) }}
            </td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
            <th>E-Mail</th>
            <td>
                {{ Form::text("email", '',array('class' => 'form-control input-sm','id' => 'email')) }}
            </td>

            <th>Line ID</th>
            <td>
                {{ Form::text("line", '',array('class' => 'form-control input-sm','id' => 'line')) }}
            </td>
        </tr>
        </tbody>
    </table>
    <table class="table table-bordered rh-table-form">
        <tbody>
        <tr>
            <th class="required">帳號</th>
            <td colspan="3">
                {{ Form::text("account", '',array('class' => 'form-control input-sm','v-model' => 'account')) }}
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <th class="required">密碼</th>
            <td colspan="3">
                {{ Form::text("password", '',array('class' => 'form-control input-sm','v-model' => 'password')) }}
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <th class="required">密碼確認</th>
            <td colspan="3">
                {{ Form::text("repassword", '',array('class' => 'form-control input-sm','v-model' => 'repassword')) }}
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <th>建立日期</th>
            <td>{!!$DrillLessorPresenter->modifydate()!!}</td>
            <th>修改日期</th>
            <td></td>
        </tr>

    </tbody>
</table>



{{ Form::submit('新增', array(':disabled' => '!isSubmit','class' => 'btn btn-info btn-sm')) }}
<a onclick="cancel()" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">取消</a>
{{ Form::close() }}

and this is my js

new Vue({
        el: "#lessor_new_crte",
        data: {
            name: "",
            areacode: "",
            phone: "", 
            mobile: "", 
            account: "", 
            password: "", 
            repassword: "" 
        },
        computed:{
            isSubmit(){
                return this.name !== "" && ((this.areacode !== "" && this.phone !== "") || this.mobile !== "") && this.account !== "" && this.password !== "" && this.repassword !== "";           
            }
        }
    });

The submit button should be disabled when not filled ,but it doesn't.

I don't know why my v-model not be binding.
